      • release

        void release()
        Explicitly release a media object form memory. All of its children will also be released.

      • release

        void release(Continuation<java.lang.Void> continuation)
        Explicitly release a media object form memory. All of its children will also be released. Asynchronous call.
        Parameters:
        continuation - #onSuccess(void) will be called when the actions complete. #onError will be called if there is an exception.
